sel.utils



@property @safe uint seconds();
Gets the seconds from January 1st, 1970.

@property @safe ulong milliseconds();
Gets the milliseconds from January 1st, 1970.

@property @safe ulong microseconds();
Gets the microseconds from January 1st, 1970.

@property @trusted bool array_remove(T, E)(T value, ref E[] array);
alias remove = array_remove(T, E)(T value, ref E[] array);
Remove an element from an array.

Params:
T value the value to be removed from the array
E[] array the array where the value should be removed from

Returns:
true if something has been removed, false otherwise

Example:
auto arr = [0, 1, 2, 3];
assert(array_remove(2, [0, 1, 2, 3]) && arr = [0, 1, 3]);

string s = "test";
assert(s.remove('t') && s == "es");


@property @trusted ptrdiff_t array_index(T, E)(T value, E[] array);
Find a value in a array.

Params:
T value the value to be searched in the array
E[] array the array to search into

Returns:
the index where the value has been found, -1 otherwise

Example:
assert(array_index(1, [1, 2, 3] == 0));
assert(array_index(0, [1, 2, 3] == -1));
assert("test".indexOf('e') == 1);


@property @safe uint roman(string str);
Convert from roman to an integer.

Example:
assert("I".roman == 1);
assert("V".roman == 5);
assert("XX".roman == 20);
assert("XL".roman == 40);
assert("MCMXCVI".roman == 1996);
assert("MMXCI".roman == 2016);


@nogc @property @safe bool one(double value);
Check if a value is between 0 and 1

deprecated @nogc @safe T between(T)(T number, T min, T max);
Set the value between two numbers.

Example:
assert(between(22, 0, 10) == 2);
assert(between(-1, 0, 10) == 9);


void call(string func, T, E...)(T array, E args) if ((isArray!T || isAssociativeArray!T) && !isSafe!(__traits(getMember, typeof(T.init[0]), func)));
@safe void call(string func, T, E...)(T array, E args) if ((isArray!T || isAssociativeArray!T) && isSafe!(__traits(getMember, typeof(T.init[0]), func)));
Call a function on every element in the array.

Example:
Effect effect = new Effect(Effects.REGENERATION, 60, "V");

// classic method
foreach(ref Player player ; players) {
   player.addEffect(effect);
}

// faster and easier method
players.call!"addEffect"(effect);


deprecated @property @safe T[] filter(T, E)(E[] array);
Filters an array and returns one that contains only the requested type.

Example:
Entity[] entities = [entity, creeper, player, bat, cow, zombie, arrow, skeleton];
assert(entities.filter!Living == [creeper, player, bat, cow, zombie, skeleton]);

Block[] blocks = [gravel, wallSign, sand, noteblock, bedrock, shrub, postSign];
assert(blocks.filter!Tile == [wallSign, noteblock, postSign]);


@property @safe T safe(T, E)(E value);
Perform a safe conversion.

Example:
assert(90.safe!ubyte == 90);
assert(256.safe!ubyte == 255);
